body.p:
Richmond Ky Dec 20 1860
Gov Magoffin
Dear Sir
A petition will be presented to you for the relief of James Maupin Silas Hill and Thomas H Barnes form Judgments against them as securities in a Recognisance Bond for one Joseph Williams.
As I understand the facts of the case I am clearly of opinion that it is a case in ^which^ your Excellency might with propiety interfere.
The parties are all of the highest respectability and are particular personal friends of mine
I would be very much gratified if you could feel it your priviledge to remit the Judgments and relieve my friends.
It is but seldom I ask such favours and I hope you will grant this

very Respectfully
Yours
Ja's C, Caldwell

Madison Cir. ct.
3. Judgts. -- each $500
Forft Recognizances
Silas Hill & others
Respd 12. mos
Issd Decr 24. 1860
